entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
